availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Hancock (Union County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married Harriet Scott Hancock in Union County in November 1856. Father of Susan Hancock, Perlina Hancock, John Hancock, Amelia A. Hancock, Wallace Hancock, Sarah E. Hancock, Luella Hancock, Caswell G. Hancock, and Catharine A. Hancock. Guardian of Bell T. Scott.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 485-486.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield Precinct, p. 317A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #000562202, p. 345.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989_, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Union County Administrator Bonds, 1896-1918 (Accessed through ancestry.com on January 24, 2020), p. 139 of microfilm.
